column5: Added a test case for compiling less >= 2.

less compiler is now compatible with less >= 2
less compiler is now compatible with less >= 2

Fixed bug with unsupported unicode chars in files/pages names by embedded server
fixed bug with unsupported unicode chars in files/pages names
[README] Mention Nitrous.IO as a way to get started.
Added a .gitignore file to default boilerplate.

Freeze dependency on Mustache.js to 0.7.3.

Mustache.js 0.8.0 has a bug which fails to render block helpers inside
partials.
Cover wildcard expansion in asset bundler helper test.
No need to use the patched version of connect since the PR is merged.
fix #101 by using a patched version of connect
allow users to change the server host
Log parsing errors of Less stylesheets. Also upgrade Less module to 1.4.1 or above.
log the error and return an empty string when bundle paths are invalid. Fixes #97

Default to /index if cannot match request path

This was driving me nuts when using 'punch s' as I was constantly having to edit the url after clinking my "home" link (/).
set extnesion to html if no access type is given

make specs pass on every platform (stub os.platform method to return win32)

Added matchPath to path_utils.js
It's used to match '/' based paths even in windows

Merge pull request #79 from vladkosarev/master

Fixing robocopy (windows) exit code issue
Robocopy has special return codes, it can return positive codes even when there was no error
Use the UTF8 encoding for textual files. Fixes #62

Deleted some DS_Store files hanging around
Also, updated the .gitignore to avoid future occurrences.

fix for windows not finding template files becouse it doesn't split by /

updating specs to support windows paths

Merge pull request #55 from babo/master

Bundles with fingerprint

Be more strict when removing fingerprint information from filenames. Fix
for a bug when bundle names containing dashes.
exclude the example/output from the repo
Throw an exception if config cannot be read. Fixes #47
Fixed timezone releated bugs (had to be in Singapore to discover them ;))
Removed hardcoded localhost values from the first run js
introduce force compile option to pre-compilers. Useful especially in cases like LESS which uses imports.
support generating pages for special output formats such as RSS
don't print a newline for unmodified files in generation
Fixed argument error in wrapped require
find modules installed relative to current working directory.
give the priority to config.json file if it exists, over config directory. Fixes #41
Pass the correct modified state for the generated files
pass the path to generator hooks even if the file is not modified
Made SFTP publisher into a seperate plugin - https://github.com/laktek/punch-sftp-publisher

Merge pull request #35 from 3on/master

Allow page contents to override shared contents.

Shared contents can be errased by any page contents.

I've also added node_modules and the right .DS_Store ignore syntax.
Pass S3 specific options as request headers when publsihing the site
Create a directory index when caching sections
Clone the bundle file list before checking for updated files. Fixes #32
Don't try to fingerprint bundles when the option is disabled

Create fingerprinted bundles when generating the site
Refactored how nested and wildcard bundles are fetched. Fixes #28
Updated first run tutorial as per some suggestions provided by @sayanee
Update package.json to define test, prepublish scripts. Also, renamed sample to example as per npm recommendations.

Restrict mustache version. Fix laktek/punch#25 which is related to janl/mustache.js#257. Thanks to @jbourassa for digging this.

Sorry, This is a one gigantic commit with piled up changes
